title: The Draymond Green Show - The Harden-Simmons Trade + a Fred VanVleet Interview
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - The Harden-Simmons Trade + a Fred VanVleet Interview
description:
To start episode 13 of ‘The Draymond Green Show’ Draymond breaks down the James Harden for Ben Simmons and Seth Curry trade that the 76ers and Nets made. Then he discusses the Kristaps Porzingis trade as well as why he thinks Aaron Donald should’ve won Super Bowl MVP over Cooper Kupp. Then Draymond welcomes Toronto Raptors All-Star Fred VanVleet joins ‘The Draymond Green Show’ to discuss his mindset coming in as an undrafted player, the benefits of playing alongside Kyle Lowry, his angle of the Kawhi shot against the 76ers, the Finals against Draymond and the Warriors, and much more. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
